TEXT.TITLE: HONK KONG AND SHANGHAI <HKS> NAMES AMERICAS CEO
TEXT.BODY: The Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corp said it named John Bond chief executive officer Americas, succeeding Angus Petrie, who is retiring. Bond will have responsibility for the bank's operations in the United States, Canada and Latin America, the company said. Reuter
